item.title: Script for New Golang Web Projects
item.description: Lately several people have been going over how they have their GO projects laid out, so I thought I’d join the group. I even went as far as created a powershell script to create the basic structure and initial files for a service/daemon based golang website. It ends up with the root folder where you store your shared objects, logging, and config, and then subfolders for different aspects of your project.
